content: I like the idea of sharing training updates, and I think it will help create a sense of accountability and build anticipation for the charity walk. I'll definitely start sharing my weekly walk updates, including photos and videos. By the way, my friend Mike who joined me for the 5K walk at the local park has been a great motivator and has offered to join me for some of my training walks. Do you have any tips on how to involve friends and family in my fundraising efforts?
